name: freight broker
short_description: To start working as a freight broker, a company or individual must acquire a license from the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration (FMCSA). Brokers are also need to do insurance for the safety of both their business clients and their customers from loss. Forwarding agents have obligingness responsibilities under the Export Administration Regulations (EAR) even when their actions are contingent on information or instructions given by those who use their services.
